title: Winter celebration
description: A night of family fun to celebrate the winter season.  All are welcome.  Free admission.

title: Artist Salon
description:
A monthly program for emerging and established visual artists to socialize,
        share resources and build up the local arts community. Guest speakers are invited
        throughout the series, with each month focusing on a different topic or theme. RSVP required
        due to limited spaces.

title: Walk Richmond - Middle Arm Dyke
description:
Follow the Fraser River on this picturesque walk that passes
      by the Richmond Olympic Oval offering spectacular views of the North Shore
      Mountains. Meeting spot: Playground at Dover Park, 5855 Dover Crescent
      (across from the Richmond Works Yard).

title: Christmas Craft Fair
description:
Up to 170 vendors all with home-made crafts, baking, jewellery,
      "foodie" items and more. This is a fun event ideal as a pre-Christmas event
      and great shopping. Concession stand available with yummy treats.

title: Gateway Theatre Presents: Sink or Swim
description:
Beverley Elliott last graced the Gateway Studio in 2015 with her smash hit,
      ...Didn't see that coming. Known by her fans around the world for her recurring
      role as "Granny" on ABC Television's hit series, Once Upon a Time, Beverley is
      excited to bring her latest show, Sink or Swim, to Gateway this year.

      Sink or Swim is an evening of songs and stories from a singular talent.
      Beverley vividly reveals all the fears and foibles of five-year-old "Smelly Elliott".
      "It's Little House on the Prairie meets Lord of the Flies," says Elliott,
      as she trades the safety of the family farm for the thugs of a one-room school.
      In this poignant, playful, and relatable prequel to ...Didn't see that coming,
      Elliott navigates the uncharted waters, big adventures, betrayals and
      epiphanies that shape us all into the adults we become, and answers
      life's big questions like "Why did I eat the fish food?"

title: Winter Hayrides
description:
Hop board for this old-time favourite experience around
      Steveston Village that includes a sing-a-long and viewing of local holiday displays.

title: Lighting of the Fire Hall No. 5 (Hamilton)
description:
Bring your friends and family out to the Hamilton Fire Hall
      No. 5 and join us in celebrating the lighting of this building with an
      afternoon of activities, entertainment and refreshments.
